A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Little spoilers. Really disappointed with this movie. I was really looking forward to the development of The new characters from force awakens and Luke. What we got was a hot mess that does nothing to further the story.  All that we know and love about the classic Star Wars was thrown out for who knows what. Who is Snoke...you don't need to know\, who are Rey's parents\, who cares...because anybody can be a Jedi...right?
